American comedy, starring Eric Stonestreet, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron bumps into former clowning partner Lewis at the funeral of his mentor, and the pair decide to resurrect their double-act for a child's birthday party. Meanwhile, Phil employs dirty tactics as he tries to overcome rival real-estate agent Mitzi Roth, and Manny realises his new friend is using him to get close to Gloria - but he is not too bothered about it

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad members worry about Diaz when she responds to an active shooter alert, but are instructed to stay back at the precinct building and are powerless to help. Peralta and Boyle try to find ways to assist Diaz, Jeffords has an existential crisis, while Santiago and Gina attempt to repair the broken toilet in the ladies' room

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Diaz and Santiago team up to take down a ruthless killer who has managed to elude them for seven years. Jeffords helps Peralta to tackle the chores on his wedding planning list. Captain Holt and his rival Olivia Crawford try to convince each other to step down from the campaign to become Police Commissioner

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj finds himself in the middle of a domestic drama when he realises that the woman he's dating, Nell, has a husband, Oliver, who is very upset about their new relationship. Sheldon rents his old room back to have a quiet place to work and drives Leonard crazy by being a model tenant

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon petitions Wil Wheaton to allow him to appear on the new Professor Proton show, so the actor offers a guest appearance to Amy instead. Meanwhile, Penny gets angry when she thinks the female protagonist in Leonard's novel is based on her

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon refuses to get his hair cut as his regular barber is in a coma - a solitary change that causes chaos in the rest of his well-ordered life. Meanwhile, Howard undergoes a gruelling Nasa training programme in Houston, Texas, meaning he can only communicate with Bernadette via the internet

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is disappointed with Sheldon when he announces he is breaking his promise to go with her to a birthday party in favour of joining the boys for a Star Wars video-game marathon. Comedy, starring Mayim Bialik and Jim Parsons

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sam is determined to do whatever it takes to help his girlfriend Zoe's career, and Sally makes a decision about what to do with the McQueen's leftover winnings

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon falls ill, and his friends decide to go to a Planet of the Apes movie marathon to keep their distance, knowing he will be in a terrible mood. However, an unsuspecting Penny offers to nurse him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Teen First Dates
programme.desc: Part-time lifeguard Jamie-Lee meets cheeky boxing enthusiast Matthew, while art student Henry is set up on his first ever date with his equally shy Curtis

programme.title: Minority Report (2002)
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old estate agent Katie from Bristol is a self-confessed disaster when it comes to dating, so she hopes Naked Attraction will turn her luck around. London student James, 22, loves clubbing and has a penchant for heels and glitter but he seems to be scaring off the guys. Will any of the men hidden away behind the screens be open-minded enough for him? Anna Richardson reveals all

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson meets 24-year-old fitness fanatic Rose, whose body has been getting all the attention in the gym while her love life has been neglected. She is bored of being one of the lads and hopes to be seen for all that she is. Next up is Clarissa, a 22-year-old barista from Basingstoke who is looking for her dream woman. Will either of tonight's singletons pick the right date when everything is stripped back to basics?

programme.title: Gogglebox

As usual, the programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes

programme.title: First Dates

The chef also tries to improve the presentation of dishes emerging from the kitchen

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When a curmudgeonly resident with few fans in the community passes away, the Butlers step up to host a memorial, leading Calvin to discover an unexpected revelation about himself

programme.title: The Neighborhood

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are in Windsor, Berkshire, to meet Roy, whose garages are stacked full of bikes. Henry picks the one that doesn't work to take away, while Simon converts some 17th-century wooden beams into a pair of stylish bedside lamps

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The team looks for relatives of a woman who was part of the famous Second World War code-breaking mission at Bletchley Park in Buckinghamshire - and believe she may have had a sister. Another case uncovers the rousing story of a labour activist who fought for the rights of people in her beloved south Wales mining community, and there is a round-up of details relating to unclaimed estates

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate detectives find themselves under pressure to trace the relatives of a former RAF officer, but the task proves difficult because he has a common surname. Plus, the story of a man who, having already lost two brothers in the First World War, suffered further tragedy while protecting his family decades later during the Blitz

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Another selection of B&B owners take it in turns as hosts to decide which of their establishments provides the best value for money. However, there is some grumbling over breakfast about the bacon

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners stay at Compton House in Newark, Nottinghamshire, which is run by Lisa Holloway - who prides herself on providing a home away from home for her visitors. However, some of the guests have issues with dust and the haddock served at breakfast - and challenge whether a night's stay is worth the price tag

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Dave and Jo Bate welcome their guests to the White Horse, a pub and B&B in Ripon, North Yorkshire, where they hope an afternoon of morris dancing in front of the cathedral will make a lasting impression. Unfortunately, Ed and Jane Mitchell get locked inside their room by mistake, and there are arguments over tomatoes at breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Retired teachers Ed and Jane Mitchell welcome the contestants to the Old Farmhouse, Cheshire, but everyone is shocked to discover they will have to share a bathroom. Meanwhile, Sam and Ian Sugden find an unwelcome surprise underneath their bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Payment day arrives, as the guests gather to find out who has won and to thrash out their differences - from some fishy findings to a reminder of why sorry can be the hardest word. Later on, a heated exchange about cleaning ends in tears

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: Three restaurants compete in Shoreditch, east London. Filipino fusion restaurant Rapsa kicks off the competition with a dish of pig's head. Greek couple Nick and Elena, owners of Touch of Greek produce some giant prawns and entertain with some traditional Greek dancing

programme.desc: New owners Amy and Marc have big dreams to turn their 20-room chateau into a B&B and yoga retreat. programme.desc: Michael Butcher and Phil Palmer want to bring a touch of urban glamour to their new home at Christmas Farm near Newbury, Berkshire, by creating a modern farmhouse that combines an open-plan party pad with functional spaces below. As the builders set to work on the handcrafted flint exterior, complete with a vast trapezoid window, the pair juggle construction with farming the land, and in an attempt to make the project work financially, they set up a microbrewery in the barn. programme.title: Heir Hunters

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: The chef's gastronomic road trip from Venice to Istanbul through the countries of the former Byzantine Empire is nearing its end as he leaves southern Greece for the shores of western Turkey. On the Cesme Peninsula Rick enjoys creamy Armola cheese matured in goat skins, Urla's famous red wine and the ultimate Turkish breakfast. He also cooks the country's iconic dish sultan's delight - a mouth-watering lamb stew on a bed of aubergine puree

programme.desc: The trio of motoring enthusiasts embark on another epic road trip, this time across western America in front-engined supercars. Jeremy Clarkson pilots the Lexus LFA, which has a spectacularly high-revving V10 powerplant, Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the muscular Dodge Viper, and James May opts for the latest incarnation of Aston Martin's Vanquish. On their journey from Las Vegas to Palm Springs via Los Angeles, the presenters tackle racing circuits and find themselves in a race against the police, before rushing to the Mexican border - and there's a terrifying penalty for the last man to arrive. Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac drummer Mick Fleetwood rolls up his sleeves to thrash the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a race from London's Wembley Stadium to Milan's San Siro, the home of Italian football giants AC and Inter. A price restriction leads Jeremy to grab the keys to a Shelby Mustang GT500, which costs the equivalent of 35,000 in America and packs a supercharged punch of more than 650bhp. James and Richard pin their hopes on the pan-European rail network in a bid to secure the prize of tickets to a top-flight football match, with nothing but a long journey home awaiting the losers. On the test track, Jeremy puts Toyota's GT86 coupe through its paces, and its promise of entertaining rear-wheel-drive handling should put a smile on his face. Joining her is 28-year-old painter decorator Alex, 45-year-old bridal shop owner Abbi, 60-year-old community centre manager Janet and 56-year-old record label boss Phil. A hilarious evening lies in store, with unexpected tattoos, beauty tips and twerking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Would-be clairvoyant Janet hosts the second of a week of dinner parties in Leeds and hopes her ghoul-themed dinner party will help her win the cash prize. Part of Janet's plan is to pretend her house is haunted and she has a practical joke lined up for nursing manager Sarah and bridal shop owner Abbi to find. With more surprises in store, will the fright-night theme be enough to ghost Janet into the lead?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Record label owner Phil hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, hoping to win the 1,000 prize money by serving up a 1970s rock-themed menu. His guests are astounded by his mystery past, and painter and decorator Alex is unimpressed when wedding shop owner Abbi continues to wind him up

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Painter and decorator Alex hosts the fourth night in Leeds, hoping to win the prize money by serving up a cruise-themed menu from around the world - which impresses jealous rival Janet so much, she almost turns violent. Abbi continues to belittle the host - until he reveals he spends his evenings on stage impersonating a famous heart-throb singer. Will his performance bag him the top prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bridal shop owner Abbi hopes to woo her guests with a wedding-themed party on the final day of the competition in Leeds. All week Abbi and Michael Buble impersonator Alex have had a bit of a banter that has sailed close to the wind. Will the tension take over, or can the wedding theme create an amorous atmosphere that will help Abbi win the 1,000 prize?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jason and Lindsay Crossland from East Yorkshire met 28 years ago when they were working for the RAF. Lindsay suffers from osteoarthritis, which affects her mobility, and as warm sunshine helps her condition their dream is to spend every school holiday in Florida with their son before eventually retiring there. They have a budget of up to 180,000, but will Ben Hillman be able to find them what they're looking for?

programme.title: Billionaire Blooms
programme.desc: Jamie's in Venice with a limitless budget and complete creative freedom, fashioning two stunning set-ups for the wedding of one of his most treasured clients. He has assembled a squad of talented florists to help him as he transforms an ancient palazzo and a world-famous hotel. On the outskirts of Edinburgh, Ian and his team of florists attempt their biggest ever floral arch. It's just the starting point of an epic installation within a stunning castle. With so many weddings scheduled for the summer, time is the biggest pressure so there's not a moment to waste

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Singer Ellie Goulding, comedian Mawaan Rizwan, TV presenter and disability advocate Sophie Morgan and actress Tracy-Ann Oberman take part in the charity baking show. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith they tackle marble cake and jam roly-poly, before making a showstopping biscuit in honour of their celebrity hero. Presented by Noel Fielding and Matt Lucas

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The opinionated TV viewers pass judgement on the best and worst shows of December 2013, including Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, A Great British Christmas with Sarah Beeny and I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them. Greg Davies has some tricky judging to do when people question the definition of the colour gold and nobody understands a simple egg-shelling task. As usual, Alex Horne offers sterling support to all concerned

programme.title: The Kidnap of Angel Lynn
programme.desc: Using exclusive interviews, social media and immersive graphics, this documentary tells the story of the abusive relationship that led to the life-altering abduction of Angel Lynn. At just 18 years-old, Angel met her boyfriend through a mutual friend and he rapidly became abusive towards her, isolating her and ultimately abducting her. After being forced into a van, Angel fell from the back of the speeding vehicle and was left on the side of the road with near-fatal injuries that left her unable to walk, speak or feed herself. Her story is retold as she learns to live again

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson is joined by 25 year-old Lauren, a movie buff and professional online gamer from Camberley who is looking for a geeky gamer to be her perfect player two so she can reboot her love life after three years of being single. Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?

programme.title: The Greatest Auction
programme.desc: AJ Odudu hosts as millionaires, private collectors and antique dealers compete to buy extraordinary items. Banksy experts take a risk on a piece of wall featuring work attributed to the anonymous artist and Tommy Cooper's iconic fez goes on sale. Plus, a jar of pickled pig foetuses and an array of Buzzcocks memorabilia

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Sonya, a 77-year-old tour guide who has been widowed for 15 years, is looking for a man to share experiences with, and is set up on a date with 69-year-old film rigger Graham. Meanwhile, 26-year-old florist Charlotte meets 29-year-old data analyst Adam from Blackpool, and former dancer and extrovert Patrick goes on a date with laid-back graphic designer Seph

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Stoke couple Julie and Allen cannot agree on any of the houses they have viewed together, but they are also at a loss as to how they can make their current three-bedroom abode any better. In Newcastle, GP Kathleen and her anaesthetist husband Tom have a three-bedroom Victorian semi in disorganised chaos with Tom's sporting gear taking root everywhere. Should they move on or reconfigure the downstairs?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ballet enthusiast and hospitality management student Erwin Orduz hosts the fourth dinner party in Glasgow and hopes to impress his guests with an evening of shocks and surprises. He attempts hotel-style presentation and serves up his meals in a dining room that has been decorated with a menagerie theme of animals and nakedness

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In north London, Helen and her Albanian boyfriend David kick off the contest with their Greek menu. Their food goes down well with Sara and her Aussie husband Thierry, which is more than can be said for David's views on women's roles within the home. On day two, Vicky and Geoff cook up an Italian menu, but their rock and pop idol dress code is a huge flop with one couple. The hosts face a grilling over food shortcuts, and Helen and Vicky go head to head in the battle of the cheesecakes. Finally, Sara and Thierry serve up the fashions and food of the 1980s. However, one guest makes a fashion faux pas about Sara's favourite frock

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa Meredith have aspired to own a holiday home in South Tenerife for years, and are ready to pursue their dream now that their children have left home. Jasmine Harman helps them navigate the local property market and shows them an apartment with amazing views for almost 20,000 under their 100,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Young-at-heart couple Natalie and Andy Ray love Florida for its fun-filled attractions and weather, and are looking for a future family holiday home there. Ben Hillman tempts them with five homes within easy reach of the theme parks, all within their budget of 280,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: A Cornish couple want to leave Penzance to spend their retirement in Spain. On the Algarve, a former sailor and his wife are looking to buy their perfect Portuguese property

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: The owners of a village in the Limousin region of France discover their roof needs repairing. A Manchester couple host a wedding reception in their hamlet

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Gemma turns an old TV cabinet into a luxury dog bed, while Henry trades in his lifelong love of mechanicals to upcycle wooden furniture

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Wrestling promoter Dale Harvey hosts the first dinner party in Derby, where he hopes to impress aspiring thespian Beth Dunmore, business support manager Jo-Anna, mother-of-three Ondine Shardlow, and triathlete David Morris with a wrestling-themed extravaganza featuring large men in tight lycra. However, a fractious royal debate dampens the mood

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Business support manager Jo-Anna hosts the second dinner party in Derby, and hopes to wow her guests with a glitz and glam evening - complete with ball gowns and poetry. However, David is hoping for a more lively night - and his antics do not impress fellow contestant Dale

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: PR whizz Beth Dunmore hosts the third night in Derby, and she hopes to impress her guests with her vaguely Middle Eastern menu. However, she has her work cut out when it comes to the fussy David Morris, whose confidence seems to be growing as the week progresses. Beth has a fan in cruise ship connoisseur Jo-Anna, though, while single mum Ondine Shardlow is disappointed with the level of competition and thinks she has the week in the bag

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ondine Shardlow hosts the fourth dinner party in Derby, hoping to impress her guests with a flavoursome Greek holiday-inspired menu. However, her carefully planned evening takes a turn for the worse when she manages to insult Dale, and Jo-Anna displays some questionable table manners

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final day of the dinner party contest in Derby and the turn of triathlete David Morris to serve his offerings. Ondine is not impressed by his small portions, big flavours approach, and is even less satisfied with Jo-Anna's behaviour during the week. The host throws an impromptu work-out class where wrestling promoter Dale Harvey is put through his paces, before the winner of the 1,000 prize is announced

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi heads to Poitou-Charentes in the west of France to help house-hunters Jules and Gaynor, who are planning a permanent move to rural France to run their own gite

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of Simon and Jill Bennett as they try to restore two timber-framed barns in Suffolk. The couple found out that one of the buildings is among the smallest surviving medieval guildhalls in the country, and while Kevin advises them to conserve it in its present state, Simon is determined to restore it to its former glory

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil help househunters in Edinburgh. Phil meets Freya and Elliot who are moving from Aberdeen to the capital for the cultural buzz. Kirstie helps Edinburgh lass Sadia and Irishman Sohail find their first family home so they can finally move out of Sadia's starter flat

programme.title: The Equalizer (2014)
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.desc: Yvonne Finlayson hosts the final night of the cooking competition in Glasgow, offering her guests a combination of 'scientifically-infused' food, high-octane entertainment and scintillating chat - plus a healthy dose of revelations - to try to claim the 1,000 prize

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples in north London compete to host the best dinner party. First to host are husband and wife Elorm and Mimi, who are confident their Afro-fusion menu and some Afro-beats will see them triumph. Night two sees Kiri and Dale host a soiree that includes an introduction to the host's love of taxidermy. On the final night, hosts Serge and Eleni treat their guests to a menu originating from their Greek-Cypriot heritage. Their twist is a somewhat unique 'Kebab Olympics' in the back garden

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Reg and Aby Solomon from Hertfordshire look to buy a family holiday home near the Spanish town of Denia on the popular Costa Blanca. Laura Hamilton searches every nook and cranny of the local market in an attempt to find properties that match the couple's 200,000 budget, but it remains to be seen whether she can deliver the perfect place in the perfect location

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Hyacinth Miller from London first visited Barbados 14 years ago, and now that she's retired, wants to permanently relocate there and spend time in the garden. With her son Leon along to help choose the right property, Jasmine Harman shows Hyacinth five properties in the south of the island, but do any of them have her packing her bags for a new life in the sun?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Alicante, early retirees Sarah and Mark search for a home in the sun on a budget on 120,000 euros, while the Rodriguez family throw a housewarming party with a difference

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: The owners of a village in France host the local council at their restaurant, while a couple from Norwich spend their first Christmas in their hamlet. Meanwhile, in Spain, the very first guests arrive at a cave village in Andaluca

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit Oxford to meet Rosemary, whose father owned a second-hand goods shop. They discover a servant's call bell and a mysterious pedal-powered tool, which Simon is anxious to restore

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The competition heads to Manchester, where battling it out for the 1,000 cash prize are part-time DJ Dom, 35-year old barber Danny, trainee barrister Sasha, nurse Katherine and goth Maria. In the first edition, DJ Dom kicks off the week serving up a menu inspired by the 1990s 'Madchester' music scene

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Trainee barrister Sasha hosts the second night in Manchester, where she hopes to impress her guests with a Chinese-Pakistani fusion menu. Meanwhile, fellow contestant Maria reveals more about her love of gothic culture, and Danny discusses his soon-to-be-written autobiography

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nurse Katherine hosts the third dinner party in Manchester, and she opts for a simple menu of a smoked salmon with horseradish cream starter, and a chorizo and chickpea main course. At the table, direct questioning and some extraordinary revelations cause some of the guests to feel uncomfortable

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Barber Danny hosts the fourth night of the competition in Manchester, and decides on an evening of Bulgarian cuisine as a homage to his wife. His party ends with some Bulgarian language lessons that bemuse fellow diners Dom and Maria

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final night in Manchester and glamorous goth Maria is hoping to wow her guests with her twist on Asian cuisine. Some of the guests are feeling a little uneasy that the host will impart her love of vampire culture upon her menu, but the blood-free dishes even manage to impress daddy's girl Sasha. However, an avant-garde transgender dancer creates a stir, and at one point it seems possible that Maria has bitten off more than she can chew

programme.desc: A woman collapses in the street while out shopping and may have broken her hip, while a man threatens to take an overdose if the paramedics do not take him to hospital

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors treat 15-year-old Meldred, who has been stabbed in the thigh by a stranger while walking to school, and are concerned that the knife may have caused significant damage or internal bleeding. The medical staff also try to diagnose what is wrong with sports commentator Andrew, who has an inflamed ankle with blood spots and a rash, and treat 11-year-old Penelope, who has hurt her finger falling in the playground

programme.title: Night Coppers
programme.desc: On the beat with the police officers of Brighton after dark. Young officers Matt and Will stop an ex-police chief for suspected driving under the influence. But things turn awkward when it turns out she isn't. Determined to prove themselves they attend a suspected arson where they are determined to catch the culprit. Sophie and Rachel investigate a possible street assault that has left a man with life-threatening injuries and Steve comes across a pair of legs sticking out of the bushes. The question is - whose are they?

programme.desc: Cameras follow Wayne, a one-man Beatles tribute act, and he performs up and down the Costa del Sol and also embarks on a new venture, setting up his own beer company

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Louise and Ed, who run a catering company in the town of Sotogrande on the Costa del Sol, prepare healthy dishes for a slimming boot camp at a beautiful villa

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey tries to find the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their high-school dance routine for a TV programme. Comedy, guest starring Elle Macpherson

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey finally dates Janine, but she does not like his friends. Rachel worries that Phoebe will not appreciate the way she has furnished their apartment owing to her 'environmental conscience'. Comedy, guest starring Elle Macpherson

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe's frank attitude causes Monica and Rachel to lose their tempers. Joey reluctantly accepts a job as a waiter at Central Perk, while Ross and Chandler argue over which of them made up a raunchy joke

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel gives advice on being more independent to her pampered younger sister (Reese Witherspoon), who promptly makes her regret it by flirting with Ross. Meanwhile, Joey gets in trouble for giving free food to female customers at Central Perk

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: On the A1 near Leeds, an intoxicated driver rams a police car before heading the wrong way down the dual carriageway and the cops instigate a risky containment manoeuvre to bring him to a standstill. In Halifax, a criminal's wellbeing becomes officers' primary concern after they discover a trail of blood at the scene of an apparent drink-related crash

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Highlights of the documentary giving an insight into the working life of officers patrolling the nation's roads as they combine modern technology and old-fashioned methods to bring criminals to justice. Officers pursue a drug runner down one of the UK's busiest motorways, and a drug deal results in a white-knuckle race through Bradford's back streets

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Specially trained officers try to stop a 4x4 as it is driven dangerously through the streets of Basildon, and pursue a fake ambulance. In the air above Essex, the police helicopter trails a pair of teenage car thieves

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The team tracks three men suspected of burgling a number of plumbers' merchants, and a fleeing van causes a major accident by speeding the wrong way around a busy roundabout. Police also investigate illegally customised vehicles in Basildon, Essex, and a man threatens to battle through a street full of officers

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Two new officers chase a gang of youths spotted joyriding around an Essex village in a stolen car. A counsellor is called out to avert a potential suicide on the M25, and a thief's attempts to misdirect the team fall flat when damning evidence of his crimes is found in his car

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: Documentary following shopping centre security teams who are locked in a cat and mouse battle to catch criminals

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: The hostility between Justin and Leah intensifies. After Felicity's surprise proposal, Tane is unsure, but eventually agrees to tie the knot - again

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Leah brings Justin's world crashing down when she shows him the seductive photos of Ava, and he realises he has been played. Mackenzie is filled with dread when Gabe disappears

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Doctors deal exclusively with the vital issue of mental health, treating patients including a young man seeking help because he thinks he is hearing voices inside his head, and a regular patient who has a relapse with her anxiety. Other cases include a man suffering from panic attacks, and a patient who is responding well to his medication to treat schizophrenia

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: A high number of call-outs for ambulances has resulted in paramedics queuing with patients in the corridor at Barnsley Hospital's A&E department, so the team must decide who is seen at once and who can wait. Priority is being given to two patients fighting for breath, with junior doctor Emma Faragher treating 72-year-old Lynda and Dr Chris Lamare attending to two-year-old Seb

programme.title: Kids Who Kill: Evil Up Close
programme.desc: The case of Kim Edwards, who was just 14 when she and her boyfriend became Britain's youngest double murderers, having slaughtered Kim's mother and sister as they slept

programme.title: The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: The case of Gareth Williams, a GCHQ employee on secondment to MI6, who was found dead inside a padlocked duffel bag in the bath of his London flat in 2010. The case has become one of the biggest unsolved mysteries in recent British history, and even now, 12 years after Williams' death, the public are still waiting for answers as to what happened to the 31-year-old codebreaker. Through interviews with former detectives, forensic investigators, MPs and people who knew Gareth, along with archive footage and reconstruction, this documentary re-examines the case in a bid to get to the bottom of the events that lead to Williams' untimely death - asking did he act alone or were other forces involved?

programme.title: Poison Ivy (1992)
programme.desc: Creepy thriller, with Drew Barrymore impressing in her first major adult role as a deranged, manipulative teenager who insinuates her way into her best friend's house. Jealous of the family's wealth, she hatches a plan to take it for herself, scheming to kill the ailing mother, seduce the father and finally frame her friend for murder. Also starring Sara Gilbert, Tom Skerritt and Cheryl Ladd, and featuring an early appearance by a young Leonardo DiCaprio

programme.desc: Cameras focus on East London baker Lee, who has transferred his skills to Benidorm, where he is offering a British alternative to traditional Spanish baked goods

programme.title: Friends

programme.desc: Part one of two. A revelation from Rachel prompts the pals to ponder what might have been if their lives had taken different courses. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The return after a break of the documentary following the work of officers from police forces across Yorkshire. Officers crack down on uninsured drivers whose recklessness raises everyone's premiums and kills more than 130 road users every year. Jamie Theakston presents

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents an edition focusing on the hunt for disqualified, unlicensed and uninsured drivers. In Bradford, officers from the West Yorkshire Safer Roads team pursue a desperate and disqualified driver through the city streets, while a member of the public is forced into making a citizen's arrest when another banned motorist attempts to flee the scene of a crash. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The team is forced to intervene when a man is assaulted in the street by his wife. Officers set out on the trail of one of the largest stolen car operations in Essex, and the interceptors put their vehicles to the test when the driver of a hijacked 4x4 goes off road in an attempt to lose them

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Inspector Emma Brookes races 40 miles to prevent a suicidal man throwing himself off a rooftop, while one of her colleagues chases a suspected drug dealer. Elsewhere, the Air Support Unit is called to track a fugitive car thief, and a man is caught with a van full of stolen clothes

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: Documentary following shopping centre security teams who are locked in a cat and mouse battle to catch criminals

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Leah brings Justin's world crashing down when she shows him the seductive photos of Ava, and he realises he has been played. Mackenzie is filled with dread when Gabe disappears

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin begs Theo to help him get through to Ava. Finding Mackenzie in a depressed slump, Mali learns that Gabe has left her

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Focusing on the work of medical students training at Horfield Health Centre, including Craig, whose first patient is looking to change her contraceptive pill. Elsewhere, a patient visits the surgery after collapsing at home following what appears to be a stroke, and doctors also treat a woman whose nose is causing her excruciating pain

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: A flood of patients with Covid-19 puts staff in the A&E department of Barnsley Hospital under pressure, with every arrival needing swabbing making waiting times even longer. Fifty-year-old Richard has been rushed in with severe burns across one side of his body, while 64-year-old Jan is in resus after his smart watch sounded the alarm when his heart rate dropped to a dangerously low level

programme.title: A&E After Dark
programme.desc: A man who fell through a window has a phobia of needles, which leads him to refuse any kind of pain relief and even attempt to discharge himself before his injuries are treated. An aggressive patient is brought in by four police officers after smashing up his mother's home, and has to undergo a toxicology test. Dr Audrey Fox tries to save the life of a patient who has overdosed, and a woman suffers a head injury after slipping on a slice of pizza her husband had left on the floor for their dog to eat

programme.title: Ambulance: Code Red
programme.desc: Paramedics rush a man to hospital after a grisly circular saw incident, and an air ambulance helps a man crushed under a great weight. Plus, an old man goes into cardiac arrest, and a child suffers from meningitis

programme.title: 999: Emergency Call Out
programme.desc: Special Sergeant Hannah and paramedic Nathan respond to an emergency in which a young man narrowly escapes death when his car smashes into a wall, explodes and bursts into flames

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Katrina, 28, has been hit by a car while crossing the road. Her legs are badly broken but trauma team leader Richard Fawcett worries she might also be suffering from other internal injuries that could put her life at risk. Forty-two-year old Michael has had his second heart attack in two weeks, so staff act quickly to remove a blood clot, and 72-year-old Trevor is brought in after falling off a shed roof. He is losing lots of blood from a head wound, but even worse, he may have broken his neck

programme.title: Sleeping with My Murderer
programme.desc: Susan Waring has learning difficulties and is partially sighted. When charming Alan Edwards waltzes into her life she is smitten, but the union soon becomes the stuff of nightmares

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Doctors deal exclusively with the vital issue of mental health, treating patients including a young man seeking help because he thinks he is hearing voices inside his head, and a regular patient who has a relapse with her anxiety. Other cases include a man suffering from panic attacks, and a patient who is responding well to his medication to treat schizophrenia

programme.title: Dogs Behaving (Very) Badly
programme.desc: Trainer Graeme Hall tries to solve more dog behavioural problems. St Bernard Tilly loves to make a song and dance about getting in the car, so going on any journey - no matter how small - is a big stress for her owners. Maisie the Maltipoo should be the perfect mascot for aspiring fashionista Charlotte, but she's turning heads for all the wrong reasons. Every time a trendy east London pooch struts their stuff anywhere near Maisie, she mouths off, and it's a constant cause of embarrassment for Charlotte

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin begs Theo to help him get through to Ava. Finding Mackenzie in a depressed slump, Mali learns that Gabe has left her

programme.desc: Entertainer Natalie transforms a garden into a 10th birthday party paradise, while Beckii has a busy day lined up in her beauty salon and Colin has a new arrival on his home farm

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Simon Duggan follows his dream of becoming a professional photographer, while Sue and Rod at Easy Horse Care Rescue Centre deal with a visit from the vet

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A fire leaves Rachel and Phoebe homeless, forcing them to impose on their pals' hospitality. Meanwhile, Chandler gives Joey career advice, and Ross gets into trouble for dating a student. Comedy, with Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross's girlfriend goes on a wild weekend away, leaving him to worry about what she is getting up to. Rachel longs for a date and Joey's fridge breaks down

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross nervously prepares to meet Elizabeth's dad for the first time and Phoebe decides to write a book about Monica and Chandler. Joey is threatened with dismissal for insulting the operator of the robot alongside which he is due to star in his latest role. Guest starring Bruce Willis

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Elizabeth sneaks away with Ross to her grandmother's cabin for a romantic weekend, unaware her dad and Rachel have had exactly the same idea. American comedy, guest starring Bruce Willis

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: This edition focuses on North Yorkshire Police targeting crossborder criminals, with a fifth of theft and drug dealing committed by crooks from outside the area. Sergeant Paul is on high alert after a stolen car linked to a recent suspected firearms incident is spotted on his patch, while in Scarborough PC Dan is on the hunt for criminals in a 4x4 who have allegedly been stealing vans - and it is not long before he becomes embroiled in an off-road pursuit.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A tyre stinger is used to stop a vehicle suspected of carrying stolen mobile phones and Automatic Number Plate Recognition helps to track and intercept a vehicle suspected of being used by burglars targeting the homes of older folk

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Two officers make a surprising discovery while apprehending a gang of car thieves, and a team uses automatic number-plate recognition to identify stolen vehicles outside the biggest shopping centre in Essex. An air ambulance makes an emergency landing in Clacton-on-Sea, a three-car shunt brings the M25 to a halt and a policeman drops his handcuffs down a drain

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers conduct a 48-hour hunt for a thief who stole a 4x4, and their perseverance pays off when they manage to catch the culprit. Meanwhile, in Clacton-on-Sea, a tip-off sends the interceptors to a drug den, and the Essex chopper team co-ordinates a manhunt when three high-profile suspects evade capture by fleeing into a field full of cows

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The team is forced to don full riot gear on New Year's Eve to deal with a knife-wielding man, and unprecedented snowfall brings chaos to the roads of Essex. Meanwhile, an officer seizes a haul of mystery drugs, and the Air Support Unit lends a hand in a chase across six lanes of traffic

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Patients in need of attention include an ex-prisoner who has fallen back into drug addiction, a man with an extremely painful groin, a pregnant woman with painful ears, and a young woman suffering from extreme tiredness, dizziness and episodes of uncontrollable shaking. Plus, the doctors of Horfield Health Centre in Bristol reflect on what it is like to work as a GP in the UK today, and offer some predictions for the future of general practice in Britain in light of the many challenges it faces as a public service

programme.title: Million Pound Motorhomes
programme.desc: Following Giuseppe from the Wirral, who has made the life-changing decision to leave his stressful job as a financial director and live full time in his new motorhome. In Chattanooga, Tennessee, Nicky and Rusty are taking their new van to a local garage for a unique modification, while former tennis star Annabel Croft and her husband Mel show how they transformed a parcel delivery van into their new home on wheels

programme.title: Robin Hood (2018)
programme.desc: Battle-hardened Crusader Robin of Loxley and his Moorish commander launch an audacious rebellion against the corrupt English crown. However, they face tough competition from the twisted Sheriff of Nottingham. Director Otto Bathurst, who also worked on Peaky Blinders and His Dark Materials, delivers his take on the classic adventure yarn. Taron Egerton plays the heroic outlaw, with Jamie Foxx, Ben Mendelsohn and Tim Minchin also starring

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is killed by a stolen surveillance drone and the team links it to elusive terrorist Benham Parsa. NCIS joins forces with the Department of Defence to track down the device before it is used for a large-scale attack, but Gibbs is less than pleased that he has to work with his ex-lover Hollis Mann. Meanwhile, McGee hopes he will be granted time off to attend a black-tie gala honouring his girlfriend Delilah. Guest starring Susanna Thompson (Arrow)

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates when a respected journalist is shot shortly after writing a hard-hitting article on the New York drugs scene. It soon emerges that the story was fabricated and had earned the reporter his fair share of enemies, while an unexpected lead causes the officers to reopen a 20-year-old case concerning the murder of a famous actress. Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the case of a college professor pushed under a subway train - and the subsequent investigation leads to a man who had kidnapped his children and changed his identity 15 years earlier. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A respected financial analyst dies from an overdose of Viagra, a drug he was advised not to take. The subsequent investigation uncovers foul play involving his mistress (guest star Julia Roberts) and an unscrupulous tycoon, whose attorneys thwart McCoy and Carmichael's attempts to prosecute. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Sam Waterston

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Sanitation workers find the body of a teenage boy, and the investigation leads to a school bully who displays an enthusiastic interest in martial arts. As the case progresses, the team discovers the youngster's father had bought the murder weapon, and attempts a risky gamble to bring the killer to justice

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A schizophrenic woman is found strangled, leading Green and Briscoe to suspect a homeless man of the murder. Taken into custody, he refuses to take his antidepressant medicine, rendering himself incapable of standing trial for murder. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A separated couple blame each other for concealing their missing baby, but the discovery of bloodstains in their apartment suggests another, more tragic explanation. An angry Briscoe suspects the father of murder - until the infant's remains are found, raising the possibility that both parents could be responsible

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The NCIS team is assigned to a joint terrorism task force by the Secretary when a Moscow-born scientist who it is believed may have been targeted by the Russians for selling state secrets, is found dead. The trail appears to lead to a friend of Sofia's, another scientist who worked for Russia and who may have succumbed to professional jealousy. However, when she too is found dead, the team discovers the hallmarks of Sergei Mishnev, the terrorist who nearly killed Gibbs. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on a joint Coast Guard and NCIS training exercise at sea with Agent Borin, Gibbs spots a dead man overboard, who is found to be a missing member of the crew of a nearby vessel. However, when the agent boards the ship for questioning, he realises it has been commandeered by pirates. Naval drama, starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy commander's wife, determining whether it is linked to her role as a therapist, or an act of terrorism since her husband's name has appeared on a Jihadist's target list. Elsewhere, the group discusses Halloween costumes, as well as Tony's recent dating habits. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Five women are found dead in Oklahoma, each robbed of one of their senses. Meanwhile, Reid is angry with JJ and Prentiss for their deception. Crime drama, guest starring Andy Milder (Weeds) and Tracy Middendorf (Boardwalk Empire)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When wealthy couple the Gillettes are found dead, it seems a case of murder-suicide perpetrated by the husband. However, Cragen discovers the crime was a homicide, and Benson and Stabler have to tread carefully since the victims had generously donated to both a police charity and the mayor. Their daughter Anne claims a man has been stalking her, but he turns out to be a detective investigating her for fraud - who also suspects she killed her parents for their money. Guest starring Naveen Andrews (Lost) and Edward Hibbert (Frasier)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called in when a woman working with a band is found raped and murdered, and their enquiries lead them to suspect they are searching for a killer apparently targeting members of the gay community. Their investigation is hampered by the interference of lesbian activist Babs Duffy, who has her own agenda. Guest starring comedienne Kathy Griffin

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when two prostitutes are found murdered with prayer cards next to their bodies, but their initial enquiries hit a dead end. They get a break when a third victim is found alive and she thinks her assailant was a religious fanatic who believes he is saving the women he kills. Starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are forced to rely on an officer from another district when a rape victim refuses to talk to anyone except him, but Stabler has doubts about the trustworthiness of their unknown colleague. Introductions to the new ADA do not go well when she insists an interview with a suspect be brought to a premature close. Christine Lahti (Chicago Hope) joins the cast, with guest star Wentworth Miller (Prison Break)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU is assigned to profile an unidentified suspect responsible for killing two people whose bodies have been found with nearly 50 stab wounds each. What first appears to be the work of a disorganised gang is revealed to be the actions of a man prone to traumatic hallucinations, and the team needs to discover the root of his problems before he kills again

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The agents go on the trail of a female serial killer and find themselves searching for a suspect driven by her own grief. The team members also attend individual therapy sessions to help deal with the loss of their friend and colleague. Crime drama, starring Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers faulty bulletproof vests in an abandoned truck filled with stolen USMC merchandise, and attempts to locate the source of the cargo and any vests that could have been sent to military personnel overseas. Crime drama, guest starring Challen Cates, with Mark Harmon

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A sound-system installer is murdered after supplying goods to a strip club covertly operated by the Mafia, and the finger of blame points to a small-time hoodlum whose crime boss father is serving life imprisonment. The case eventually comes to trial - but investigators are disturbed to hear an untrustworthy government attorney is handling the prosecution. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A pregnant student is found murdered, and detectives Briscoe and Curtis discover she was strangled to death before being stabbed by the killer in an effort to make the attack seem like the random act of a psychopath. A mathematics professor soon comes under suspicion as eyewitnesses allege he was close to the crime scene on the night in question

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Part one of two. A shootout between a motorist and the police leads to the discovery of a body in a car boot - and puts the detectives on the trail of a money-laundering operation run by Russian gangsters. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Part one of two. Best-selling mystery writer PK Todd and her accountant are gunned down outside a restaurant. Miraculously, Todd survives but her companion is mortally wounded, prompting Briscoe and Green to launch a murder inquiry and discover the culprit's real target. However, they soon find themselves mixed up in a deadly case of jealousy and betrayal. Guest starring Ruthie Henshall and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The seemingly straightforward murder of a stockbroker plunges Briscoe and Green into the murky world of insider-trading and blackmail, as they learn that the victim led a seedy double life. However, their investigations take on a new dimension when the suspected killer is himself bumped off by a professional hitman. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a white teenager in Harlem seems like an open-and-shut case - until two patrol officers are implicated in the crime. As tensions between residents and investigating officers mount, the Mayor puts pressure on Schiff to make an example of the cops, hoping it will be enough to satisfy ADA McCoy. Drama, starring Steven Hill

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers a fraudulent charity that preys on those searching for missing military personnel while investigating the murder of a retired Master Sergeant. Meanwhile, Bishop agonises over the results of her probation evaluation, and Tony contemplates adopting a stray cat that followed him home. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the cause of a hit-and-run incident in which a Petty Officer has been killed. Meanwhile, Gibbs works to clear a Navy Hospital Corpsman who has been indicted for illegally providing medical aid to victims of the crash, despite the injured insisting her techniques helped save their lives. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An enigmatic killer shoots dead a businessman spending Thanksgiving at a hotel in the city, then takes his glasses, jewellery and ID to Washington Dulles airport, which has been brought to a stand-still by a massive snowstorm. As the murderer's actions take effect, a terror alert is issued, leaving all northern US airports in a state of panic, and leaving it up to DiNozzo, Bishop and her husband - all of whom are trapped at Dulles by the weather - to bring the armed villain to justice. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherley

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Jamie risks ruining his undercover work when he is hailed as a hero by the media for saving a baby from a burning building. Meanwhile, a dead firefighter's son prompts Danny to reopen a closed case - a decision that infuriates his fellow detectives

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the abduction and killing of a woman in a building owned by powerful investment banker Richard Morgan. Munch realises the murder echoes a crime committed 20 years previously, and while the man found guilty is still in prison, Morgan was the key witness in his trial and delivered the evidence that ultimately convicted him. Guest starring Richard Burgi (Desperate Housewives)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Lainie McCallum claims to have been raped - although Stabler and Benson have little information to go on until she mentions the attack stopped when a woman pulled the man off her and punched him. The detectives track down the suspected assailant, but Lainie collapses during the subsequent trial and the only hope of securing a conviction is to persuade the eyewitness to speak out. However, she is reluctant to testify because she is an illegal immigrant who was the victim of war crimes in the Democratic Republic of Congo

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape and murder of Laura Santiago, an animal rights campaigner who had been working on a documentary exposing shocking facts about the meat-processing industry. Her mentor, journalist Jake Bradshaw, tells them certain businesses did not like what she was doing and points them to the location of her last shoot

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A former Wall Street financier is questioned in connection with the murder of his girlfriend, whose body has been found stuffed in a suitcase. As inquiries proceed, the focus of the investigation gradually shifts to the CEO of a dating website - whose refusal to discuss the case prompts Benson and Stabler to seek Executive Assistant District Attorney Sonya Paxton's help. Guest starring Eric McCormack (Will & Grace)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A San Diego stalker is killing brunette, female college students in a variety of gruesome ways and BAU's new addition Ashley Seaver needs to prove her worth before more teenagers meet the same grisly fate. Drama, starring Rachel Nichols and David Rossi

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Morgan, Hotch and the team find themselves on the trail of a murderer with a worrying penchant for photography, and their investigation reveals there is more to the suspect than they first thought. Crime drama, starring Shemar Moore

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. DiNozzo, McGee and the FBI continue to track political connections to a case, and Bishop sends DiNozzo a souvenir. Meanwhile, Gibbs and Special Agent Pride chase leads in New Orleans after evidence points to a copycat killer. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Scott Bakula

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee's girlfriend Delilah makes a breakthrough in a case involving the alleged death of a US navy lieutentant. However, when her boss orders her to back away, she turns to the NCIS team for help. Meanwhile, McGee talks to DiNozzo about whether he should move forward with his relationship. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Part two of two. As the case continues, Assistant DA Antonella Ricci and eyewitness Billy Woodson's mother are found dead at a supposedly safe location, killed by Colombian drug-dealers working alongside the Russian gangsters. Drama series, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a man goes on a shooting spree in Central Park, Briscoe and new partner Green pull out all the stops to trace the weapon. McCoy, meanwhile, sets his sights on finding the killer - and the person who sold him the gun. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach, Jesse E Martin and Sam Waterston

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the shooting of a civil court judge. Catching the man they think responsible, they bring him to trial - but the victim refuses to implicate him. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates the bombing of a helicopter that left all six passengers dead. The trail leads to the widow of one of the victims, and her financial dealings with an enigmatic couple. However, as the net closes, more than one motive emerges for the killings. Real-life husband and wife Michael McKean and Annette O'Toole guest star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A teacher's body is found in the boot of her car. Suspicions that she was having an affair are soon confirmed, but the case takes a sinister turn when the trail leads to her husband and fanatical father-in-law. Jerry Orbach stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a wealthy art patron is found murdered and her body mutilated, the team's inquiries lead to failed painter Larry Brunig, who objected to the obscene nature of the art supported and promoted by the victim - and a probe into his past reveals a violent history

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee deals with his father's recent death by writing him a letter outlining the details of his latest investigation. The case involved tracking down a hactivist collective known as Krampus, who were thought to have been responsible for an incident in which the internet crashed all over Washington, DC. McGee and Abby brought in three known cyber-terrorists for questioning, and discover evidence that links the trio to an attempted breach of the Congress e-mail server and archive. However, when this line of inquiry reaches a dead-end, the team picks up a new lead that suggests an isolated hacker from Wisconsin may be responsible. This 'lone wolf' scenario does not seem plausible to McGee, though, as he recalls a lesson his late father taught him. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of five people, all of whom are identified as being from the US Navy, are found on the floor of a diner, and all are connected to a suspicious tax firm that specialises in helping people who are in arrears. When further killings are linked to the business, the team realises the crime seem to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives appear at the location with something important to discuss with the agent. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Munch investigates the rape and beating of a mute girl who can only communicate by drawing pictures. The case becomes more complicated with the realisation that a sketch of her attacker resembles a local priest, who may have antagonised some of his parishioners because of his controversial practices. Crime drama, starring Richard Belzer

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called to the scene when a young man is discovered bludgeoned to death in a storage room at a hotel and a wallet found nearby identifies him as 16-year-old Andrew Hingham. However, when the teenager inexplicably contacts his mother while the detectives are questioning her, it quickly becomes clear this is a case of mistaken identity, and the real Andrew was with the murder victim in a romantic capacity. They propose that he murdered his boyfriend in a jealous rage - a possibility that becomes more likely with the news that Andrew spent time in a psychiatric ward for schizophrenia

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape and murder of Laura Santiago, an animal rights campaigner who had been working on a documentary exposing shocking facts about the meat-processing industry. Her mentor, journalist Jake Bradshaw, tells them certain businesses did not like what she was doing and points them to the location of her last shoot

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman disappears, her boyfriend implicates downstairs neighbour Callum Donovan, an ex-con who Stabler helped put in prison 19 years earlier. As the detectives investigate his alibi, Benson receives a phone call informing him the missing woman has been found in the Hudson river and that she is still alive. Guest starring Stephen Rea (The Shadow Line) and Deborah Ann Woll (True Blood)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The remains of several bodies are found buried in the ocean floor off the Florida coast, and as the team investigates further, Morgan is shaken by the thought that one of the victims could be his missing cousin. Crime drama, starring Shemar Moore

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU discovers two bodies in the boot of a car and an agent faces a life-threatening situation during the hunt for the leader of a human-trafficking ring

Drama, starring James Nesbitt, Natascha McElhone, Gary Lewis and Lil Woods

programme.desc: Documentary series following dogs and their trainers as they learn to sniff out drugs and find roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.desc: The survival expert revisits personal highlights from the programme, including an encounter with wild boar in Gloucestershire's Forest of Dean and exploring the grass chalklands of the South Downs. programme.desc: Romantic comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Julie Graham. William's delighted that Mary has accepted his marriage proposal, and the couple celebrate their engagement in style - only for shocking news to arrive that the undertaking business has been sold. At the hospital, deteriorating conditions force colleagues Mary and Doris to confront their boss, and a woman in desperate need of a Caesarean section is rushed in, but she's not too keen on having the operation. With Claire Hackett and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: Crooks in Cloisters (1964)
programme.desc: Six train robbers hide from the law in a deserted monastery off the Cornish coast, where disguising themselves as monks proves the perfect way of lying low while carrying on with various criminal activities. But the crooks have a hard task keeping up the pretence when two real monks visit the island - especially since one of the gang is a woman. Comedy, with Ronald Fraser, Barbara Windsor, Bernard Cribbins, Wilfrid Brambell and Davy Kaye

programme.title: The Careless Years (1957)
programme.desc: A working class teenager pursues a romance with a girl from a rich family, but when both sets of parents disapprove of the relationship, he hatches a plan for them to flee to Mexico and get married in secret. Drama, starring Dean Stockwell and Natalie Trundy

programme.title: Screen One

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: As Rick and Molly's wedding approaches, the girls enjoy a wild hen night surrounded by booze and naked men. But as the party gets into full swing, Mary makes a shocking announcement - she's three months' pregnant. William is delighted with the news, but has enough to worry about when the firm is asked to conduct its first Chinese funeral, complete with fireworks. Meanwhile, Kate and Brendan try to slip away together for a night of passion - but next door's rampant rabbit Baldrick soon throws a spanner in the works. Starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham, Michael Begley and Cheryl Campbell

Drama, starring Sharon Small and Sarah Parish
